title: Why the treaty was signed in the Hall of Mirror of Versailles? - Quora

response.answer_text: In part, if not largely, to humiliate the Germans. The Wilhelm I was proclaimed Emperor in the Hall of Mirrors in Versailles in 1871. Versailles had been occupied by the German Army during the Franco-Prussian War. Versailles itself was also a symbol of French power, at it was Louis XIV’s royal palace. This is a contemporaneity drawing of that proclaimation https://forbiddenmusicdotorg.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/die_kaiserproklamation_1871_gemc3a4lde_von_1877.png
